articles.title: Traders Supercharge Global Rate-Cut Bets on Mounting Virus Fears
articles.description: Bets on rate cuts accelerated on Monday, with Fed pricing alone moving about 10 basis points amid a global rush to safety
articles.content:
(Bloomberg) -- The global economic disruption caused by the coronavirus has prompted traders to load up on bets that central banks will have to ride to the rescue.

articles.title: Can Italy's Coronavirus Crackdown Actually Work?
articles.description: Rome has no choice but to try to contain a virus that has killed so many. But a frightening aspect of the flareup is that no one is sure where it came from.
articles.content:
Worrying times.
If you looked at a table with the number of confirmed coronavirus infections by country, you’d think Italy was in Asia.
